entry.title: REPRESENTATIVE BOICE FILES FOR RE-ELECTION
entry.summary: November 6, 2023 3:50 a.m. State Representative Court Boice has filed for re-election in House District 1. Boice said, “As we head toward 2024, I look for solid and continuing successes as my job is to do everything possible to improve the quality of life for everyone I represent”. Boice said with all that is...

entry.title: WINSTON MAYOR TO ISSUE PROCLAMATION HONORING VETERANS
entry.summary: November 6, 2023 3:40 a.m. The Winston City Council will meet Monday evening. Mayor Scott Rutter will issue a proclamation to honor veterans, ahead of Veterans Day on Saturday. Councilors will consider a resolution for design and engineering for the Northeast Darrell Avenue Sewer and Roadway Improvements Project. Other items are on the agenda as...

entry.title: ROSEBURG GETS RECORD RAIN FOR THE DATE SATURDAY
entry.summary: November 5, 2023 5:50 a.m. Roseburg received a record amount of rain for the date on Saturday. Forecasters at the National Weather Service in Medford told News Radio 93-9 FM and 1240 KQEN that the Roseburg Regional Airport registered 2.14 inches of rain. The previous record for November 4th was 1.1 inches of precipitation, which...

entry.title: Let a cover draw you into a good book
entry.summary: ‘Don’t judge a book by its cover” is a common phrase heard in life, one we don’t always follow at Roseburg Public Library. Sometimes a great cover can draw you in to an equally good book.

entry.title: Roseburg City Council discusses the downtown parking problem
entry.summary: More questions were asked than answered in Roseburg City Council’s downtown parking workshop Wednesday as council worked through and debated various ideas of how to solve a sizable funding shortfall.

entry.title: Woman allegedly embezzled $200k from employer, under investigation since August
entry.summary: Lacey Neal Ott, 42, of Winchester, was arrested by the Roseburg Police Department at approximately 3 p.m. Oct. 16 for allegedly stealing over $200,000 from her employer via the company payroll system.
